typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared TripData = let
  AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://bdataadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata-staging/trip_data/trip_data_1.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=FZzHRog6Yu3n5jdc%2FFx7e20d5LtdfHKzdrEgIcewUqU%3D&spr=https&se=2019-11-08T17%3A17%3A51Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)),
  ChangedType = Table.TransformColumnTypes(TrimmedHeaders, {{"trip_distance", type number}, {"pickup_longitude", type number}, {"pickup_latitude", type number}, {"dropoff_longitude", type number}, {"dropoff_latitude", type number}}),
  InsertedCustom = Table.AddColumn(ChangedType, "Lat1_Rad", each ([pickup_latitude] / 180) * Number.PI),
  InsertedCustom1 = Table.AddColumn(InsertedCustom, "Lon1_Rad", each ([pickup_longitude] / 180) * Number.PI),
  InsertedCustom2 = Table.AddColumn(InsertedCustom1, "Lat2_Rad", each ([dropoff_latitude] / 180)    * Number.PI),
  InsertedCustom3 = Table.AddColumn(InsertedCustom2, "Lon2_Rad", each ([dropoff_longitude] / 180) * Number.PI),
  InsertedCustom4 = Table.AddColumn(InsertedCustom3, "Distance_Mi", each Number.Acos(Number.Sin([Lat1_Rad]) * Number.Sin([Lat2_Rad]) + Number.Cos([Lat1_Rad]) * Number.Cos([Lat2_Rad]) * Number.Cos([Lon2_Rad]-[Lon1_Rad])) * 3959)
in
  InsertedCustom4;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = TripData
in
  Source;
